alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 23 at 10:10PM MDT until April 26 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches possible, with 1 to 2 feet possible over Pikes Peak. * WHERE...Mosquito Range above 9000 Feet, Sawatch Mountains Above 9000 Feet, Western Fremont County, Teller County and Pikes Peak. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
